## Slide 5: SIGNIFICANT OPPORTUNITY TO DISRUPT

### Logo
zignaai

### Title
SIGNIFICANT OPPORTUNITY TO DISRUPT

### SUMMARY OF WASTEFUL SPENDING IN HEALTHCARE
**Nearly $1 Trillion in Wasted Spending**

#### Categories of Waste
*   **Clinical Waste: $395B**
    *   Duplicate tests and procedures
    *   ~55% of antibiotic Rx are medically unnecessary
    *   Use of ER for non-emergent conditions ~$21B/year
*   **Excessive Admin. Costs: $210B**
    *   U.S. hospitals spend ¼ of budget on billing and administration
    *   Complexity related to administering claims
    *   ~$91B in waste alone
*   **Inaccurate Payments: $170B**
    *   Overpayments due to clinical appropriateness and contract compliance
    *   Fraudulent billings ~3-10% of total health spend
    *   Increased coding complexity
*   **Inflated Prices: $90B**
    *   Skyrocketing drug costs - generic vs. brand
    *   Medicare dominate payer for DME ~20% higher
    *   Consolidation drives decreased competition

### OPPORTUNITY
*   Significant Market Opportunity: $380B of waste exists within the healthcare system
*   Data siloes and existing vendor landscape offering point solutions with little coordination across activities offer limited benefit and impact, especially as the market continues to shift toward greater levels of value-based reimbursement
*   Complexity in payments from new policy mandates, code changes, and organizational changes
*   Workflow-embedded solution to improve the accuracy of edits prior to payer submission
*   Robust content covering various clinical specialties and services to minimize coding, clinical and administrative errors
*   SaaS-based software and technology-enabled services provide flexible delivery models
*   Predictive analytics to score submissions based on the likelihood of inaccurate payment
*   Ability to integrate with workflows to bridge the gap between clinical and billing systems
*   Compare costs and quality for the same procedure across multiple hospitals
*   Identify providers whose practice patterns are suited to one's own individual needs

## Slide 6: SOLUTION OVERVIEW

### Logo
zignaai

### Title
SOLUTION OVERVIEW

### MARKET FOCUS
*   Reduce administrative cost by getting reimbursed for services first-time around, minimizing claims rework, and improve relations with payers.
*   Mitigating inaccurate payments is costly both for providers and payers alike, and requires additional, labor-intensive work on both ends. It can cost as much as $25-30 to rework a single claim for providers, and ~$20 for payers.
*   Industry average is that 4-7% of the claims are adjusted and that providers write off at least 20% of the claims.
*   Solution to provide intelligence to submit accurate bills leveraging technology and subject matter experts.

### ZIGNA APPROACH
*   AI powered software solution(s) with built-in intelligence for pre-payment accuracy and Contract management
*   Pinpoint machine learning based accuracy designed to prevent improper payments, contract loading issues and avoid provider abrasion
*   Resolve issues at root by automating processes, and educating auditors with nudges
*   Covers Medicaid, Medicare and Commercial policies
*   Sophisticated dashboard to proactively identify financial/revenue risks
*   Innovative, and scalable solution to ensure accurate reimbursements

### BENEFITS
*   Improve payment accuracy by applying content driven logic
*   Proactive remediation of errant claims prior to submission
*   Insights into errant claims by provider by line of business, location and service type
*   Reduced provider abrasion
*   Ability to integrate with existing workflows resulting in minimal disruption to operations
*   Shortened revenue cycle times resulting in improved cash flow projections

## Slide 7: END TO END MODULAR SOLUTION

### Logo
zignaai

### Title
END TO END MODULAR SOLUTION

### PRODUCTION

#### Digitization
*   Ingestion of patient charts
*   Support classification and indexing
*   High-quality ingestion accuracy

#### Extraction
*   Support code capture and Machine Learning for the included DRGs or APCs
*   Train models to improve extraction quality and increase straight-through processing %
*   Produce output in a human-readable format

#### Integration End Point
*   Integration with existing Workflow Tool
*   Downstream integration with supporting APIs

#### End-to-End Workflow
*   Process orchestration to deploy a scalable, repeatable solution

### Expertise
*   Specialized and experienced talent
*   Knowledge to span multiple service types across places of service
*   The team consists of:
    *   Coders
    *   Analysts
    *   CMS program experts
    *   Reimbursement SME

### Content and Analytics
*   Fee schedules
*   State-specific rules
*   Payer-specific and CMS rules
*   Claim Adjustment Reason Codes
*   Remittance Advice Remark Codes
*   Historical denials
*   **Examples:**
    *   Knowledge of state rules and dispute resolution process
    *   Integrated with the operational workflows to nudge billing analysts to address issues proactively

### Technology
*   Cloud-based SaaS solution
*   Rules engine with a UI to enable clinical and administrative claims editing
*   Scalable data model
*   Integration end points into existing systems
*   Near real-time remediation of errors
*   Data, analytics and reporting
*   **Examples:**
    *   Fee schedule engine
    *   Repricing tools
    *   Integration with Patient accounting system

## Slide 8: ZIGNA SOLUTION FOR INCREASED PAYMENT ACCURACY

### Logo
zignaai

### Title
ZIGNA SOLUTION FOR INCREASED PAYMENT ACCURACY

### Client's Objectives
*   Identify Over/Underpayments in Pre-Bill, Pre-pay and Post-pay
*   Support Payment Accuracy Initiatives
*   Increased Accuracy Rate
*   Automation and AI enabled solution

### Outcomes
*   Provider Profiling
*   Overpayments Identification
*   Reduction in Appeals and Grievances
*   Speed to Value
*   Superior Quality Score

### Zigna's Approach

#### Brilliant @ Basics
*   Innovative Payment accuracy services for pre-bill, pre-payment and post-payment scenarios
*   Act as an extension of the payer and provider teams
*   Robust understanding of data, system and adjudication process
*   Well-Trained Professionals To Handle line of business specific requirements
*   Onshore & Offshore teams to work on identifying payment accuracy
*   Quality Reporting And Operational Excellence

#### Identification to Prevention
*   Drive conversations with data
*   Augment data with necessary data attributes for outlier and sequential pattern analysis
*   Claim trends and provider profiles
*   Pattern analysis, predictive scoring to identify potential overpaid claims
*   Extensive experience in setting thresholds for select claims in prebill vs prepay vs postpay
*   Continuous self-learning feedback loop

#### White-Box Intelligence
*   Root Cause Analysis to minimize transition risk
*   Automation to increase throughput and accuracy
*   Develop and maintain contract matrix and payment policy information
*   Natural Language Processing to process medical records at scale
*   Comprehensive reporting that covers operational, transactional, and actionable insights

# Slide 5: SIGNIFICANT OPPORTUNITY TO DISRUPT

## zignaai

## SIGNIFICANT OPPORTUNITY TO DISRUPT

### SUMMARY OF WASTEFUL SPENDING IN HEALTHCARE

Nearly $1 Trillion in Wasted Spending

*   **Clinical Waste: $395B**
    *   Duplicate tests and procedures
    *   ~55% of antibiotic Rx are medically unnecessary
    *   Use of ER for non-emergent conditions ~$21B/year
*   **Excessive Admin. Costs: $210B**
    *   U.S. hospitals spend ¼ of budget on billing and
        administration
    *   Complexity related to administering claims
    *   ~$91B in waste alone
*   **Inaccurate Payments: $170B**
    *   Overpayments due to clinical appropriateness
        and contract compliance
    *   Fraudulent billings ~3-10% of total health spend
    *   Increased coding complexity
*   **Inflated Prices: $90B**
    *   Skyrocketing drug costs - generic vs. brand
    *   Medicare dominate payer for DME ~20% higher
    *   Consolidation drives decreased competition

### OPPORTUNITY

*   Significant Market Opportunity: $380B of waste exists within the healthcare system
*   Data siloes and existing vendor landscape offering point solutions with little coordination across activities offer limited benefit and impact, especially as the market continues to shift toward greater levels of value-based reimbursement
*   Complexity in payments from new policy mandates, code changes, and organizational changes
*   Workflow-embedded solution to improve the accuracy of edits prior to payer submission
*   Robust content covering various clinical specialties and services to minimize coding, clinical and administrative errors
*   SaaS-based software and technology-enabled services provide flexible delivery models
*   Predictive analytics to score submissions based on the likelihood of inaccurate payment
*   Ability to integrate with workflows to bridge the gap between clinical and billing systems
*   Compare costs and quality for the same procedure across multiple hospitals
*   Identify providers whose practice patterns are suited to one's own individual needs

# Slide 6: SOLUTION OVERVIEW

## zignaai

## SOLUTION OVERVIEW

### MARKET FOCUS

*   Reduce administrative cost by getting
    reimbursed for services first-time around,
    minimizing claims rework, and improve
    relations with payers.
*   Mitigating inaccurate payments is costly both
    for providers and payers alike, and requires
    additional, labor-intensive work on both
    ends. It can cost as much as $25-30 to
    rework a single claim for providers, and
    ~$20 for payers.
*   Industry average is that 4-7% of the claims
    are adjusted and that providers write off at
    least 20% of the claims.
*   Solution to provide intelligence to submit
    accurate bills leveraging technology and
    subject matter experts.

### ZIGNA APPROACH

*   Al powered software solution(s) with built-in
    intelligence for pre-payment accuracy and
    Contract management
*   Pinpoint machine learning based accuracy
    designed to prevent improper payments,
    contract loading issues and avoid provider
    abrasion
*   Resolve issues at root by automating
    processes, and educating auditors with
    nudges
*   Covers Medicaid, Medicare and Commercial
    policies
*   Sophisticated dashboard to proactively
    identify financial/revenue risks
*   Innovative, and scalable solution to ensure
    accurate reimbursements

### BENEFITS

*   Improve payment accuracy by applying
    content driven logic
*   Proactive remediation of errant claims
    prior to submission
*   Insights into errant claims by provider
    by line of business, location and service
    type
*   Reduced provider abrasion
*   Ability to integrate with existing
    workflows resulting in minimal disruption
    to operations
*   Shortened revenue cycle times resulting
    in improved cash flow projections

# Slide 11: DATA FLOW FROM RECORDS TO REVIEW

## zignaai

## DATA FLOW FROM RECORDS TO REVIEW

The current process enables the reviews, and we haven't automated 100% of the
audit. All the recommendations are validated by a reviewer. Once we have
additional data to validate, we plan to enable automated reviews.

### Diagram: Data Flow

**Received Medical Records** (Input)
    -> **OCR**
    -> **Classification**
    -> **Extraction** (Leveraging Clinical guidelines, Medical policy, Fee schedules)
        *   Reduction in review time
        *   Improved accuracy
    -> **Upload to Templates**
    -> Output split into:
        *   **Auto Validations (Identifications)**
        *   **Manual Review**
        *   **Auto Audits (No Findings)**

**Feedback Loop** (Connects outputs back to Received Medical Records input)

### Legend
*   + : Findings
*   - : No-Findings

**DELEGATED EDIT DEVELOPMENT:** Zigna will analyze Devoted's medical claims and develop the edits, which will be shared with Devoted as a part of the concept approval process. These edits will be owned by Devoted and configured in Optum CES or in Orinoco.
